mapper.select: select md.model_id, md.model_name, bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, md.remark, md.source, DATE_FORMAT(md.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_model md left join t_brand bd on bd.brand_id=md.brand_id where md.`status`=true and md.model_id=#{modelId}

select md.model_id, md.model_name, bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, md.remark, md.source, DATE_FORMAT(md.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_model md left join t_brand bd on bd.brand_id=md.brand_id where md.`status`=true
and (md.model_id like CONCAT('%',#{model},'%') or md.model_name like CONCAT('%',#{model},'%'))
and (bd.brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%') or bd.brand_name like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%'))
and md.source=#{source}
and DATE_FORMAT(md.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(md.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and md.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by md.model_id desc
